about.name: Aashish
about.title: Software Engineer turned into Enterpreneur, i have building things and helping people very, active on twitter
about.description: In June of 2022, I graduated from architecture school at the University of Toronto. There, I became obsessed with architectural visualization. I was deeply fascinated in the concepts of modularity and adaptability, how our built environment could organically evolve in conjunction with humanity.
